name: SulfonylureaAllergyIntolerance
title: Sulfonylurea AllergyIntolerance
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Codes used in FHIR Allergy/Intolerance resource to indicate allergy/intolerance to sulfonylureas),(Data Element Scope: RxNorm and SNOMED CT),(Inclusion Criteria: RxNorm codes for medications containing sulfonylureas. SNOMED CT codes for products containing sulfonylureas and for allergies and intolerances to sulfonylureas.),(Exclusion Criteria: Invalidated codes.)
